item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Welcome to my little corner of the internet. I’m Cory ‚Äî an IT specialist by trade, a Division agent by night, and someone who‚Äôs always diving into something new every couple of weeks. This blog is my digital notebook, brain-dump, and archive of the stuff I‚Äôm learning, building, and obsessing over.

üõ†Ô∏è What you’ll find here:

  • Deep dives into tech I’m exploring (especially networking & servers)
  • The Division lore breakdowns and opinions
  • Some hot takes on WWE
  • Book reviews when I actually finish them
  • Random thoughts that probably came from too much caffeine

I’m building this site as a way to document my journey and maybe help someone else who‚Äôs on a similar path.
